pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bootstrap cis-QTL Method that Corrects for the Winner's Curse // Identifies genome-related molecular traits with significant evidence of genetic regulation and performs a bootstrap procedure to correct estimated effect sizes for over-estimation present in cis-QTL mapping studies (The "Winner's Curse"), described in Huang QQ *et al.* 2018 doi: 10.1093/nar/gky780.
